CustomField.formula:
IF( Contact.User_Last_Login_Date__c >= TODAY() - 14, '1. GREEN - 0-14', IF( Contact.User_Last_Login_Date__c >= TODAY() - 30, '2. YELLOW - 15-30', IF( Contact.User_Last_Login_Date__c >= TODAY() - 90, '3. RED - 31-90', IF( Contact.User_Last_Login_Date__c >= TODAY() -10000, '4. GREY - 90+', '5. BLACK - N/A'
) ) ) )
CustomField.label: User Status
